name: Warmination
description:
You control a wheel of the futur mechanic with a gun.

Limited by your fuel you can shoot to make damage in area or build a circular wall to protect yourself !

Warnimation is a turn-based game so, when you shoot, the other player can play.

All of Sound Design, Music, Graphics and programming was made by me  (Basile Millereux)

Input :

  • Canon follow the mouse.
  • Move = Z,Q,S,D
  • Shot strength = A,E
  • Fire = MB1
  • Build = MB2
  • Jump/Fly = SPACE
  • Restart game when it's over = ESCAPE

Engine : SFML in C

Art asset : Photoshop

Warnimation was made during a student project from school Creajeux. (2020-2021)
